meanings.definition: Excessive development of the male mammary glands, resulting in breast enlargement.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed him with gynecomastias after noticing his enlarged breasts.
meanings.sent2: Some men may feel self-conscious due to gynecomastias.
meanings.sent3: When he tried on a tight shirt, his gynecomastias made him look like he had pecs of steel!
meanings.sent4: His gynecomastias were like unwelcome guests that never left.
meanings.sent5: The gynecomastias were so pronounced, they cast a shadow over his confidence.

meanings.definition: The condition of having abnormally large breasts in males.
meanings.sent1: He struggled with the physical discomfort caused by his gynecomastias.
meanings.sent2: Gynecomastias can be a source of insecurity for some men.
meanings.sent3: His gynecomastias were so big, they could have their own zip code!
meanings.sent4: To him, gynecomastias felt like carrying weights on his chest all day.
meanings.sent5: The gynecomastias stood out like mountains on his otherwise flat chest.
